titleInfo.title: Map of Places refered [i.e., referred] to in [amp]#x0022;JOHN SEVIER, the commonwealth builder[amp]#x0022;

subject.geographic: North Carolina -- Boundaries -- Tennessee -- Maps, Manuscript.

subject.topic: Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys Mcgready), 1797-1884

mods.note: This document is a map, circa 1800, of places referred to by John Sevier in East Tennessee, North Carolina, Kentucky, and Georgia.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
